fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.arduino.impl

Class ArduinoHeaterImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.arduino.impl.ArduinoHeaterImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.appliances.Heater, ArduinoHeater, fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.electricalGrid.Prosumer, fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.electricalGrid.TunableProsumer, fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.environment.Namable, fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.temperature.ThermicObject, fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.temperature.Wall

    public class ArduinoHeaterImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArduinoHeater
    This class implements heater component. Heaters are specified in metadata.xml file.
    Author:
    dragutin

      • getpPowerKitchen

        public static float getpPowerKitchen()
        Static method that returns new power for heater in the kitchen. This method is called by ArduinoSerialWriter component and this new power is sent to Arduino board.
        Returns:
        new power for kitchen heater

        Parameters:
        power -

      • updateHeating

        public void updateHeating(float newPower)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates new ArduinoSerialWriter Thread and requests heater power update on Arduino board. Parameter "setHeatingPowerCode" and "arduinoBoardCode" is defined in "metadata.xml" file and for every heater it has different value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
